title: How to Do Gerard Way's Makeup

steps.title: Begin by applying white or light makeup on your face.
steps.content: Begin by applying white or light makeup on your face. This will be your foundation. You want to get a "dead" look.

steps.title: The thickness depends on how dramatic you want to look.
steps.content: The thickness depends on how dramatic you want to look. Just make sure you get it nice and dark. Wait for your foundation to dry before applying eyeliner.

steps.title: Smear the eyeliner or add a dark shade.
steps.content: Smear the eyeliner or add a dark shade. Smudge the eyeliner around your eye. If you would rather use a bit of color, apply a dark shade of red, purple, or, for those who would like, a dark brown.

steps.title: Add some eyeshadow of your choice.
steps.content: Add some eyeshadow of your choice. Start under your eye to make it look like you haven't slept in 7 days. Use your finger to smudge the eyeshadow around, to blend it in. You don't want to overdo it, as you will look like a druggie! Next, apply to the top. This should only go up to the eyebrow, not any higher. Smudge and blend in as desired.

steps.title: (Optional) Add some color to your lips.
steps.content: (Optional) Add some color to your lips. Go with pale pink, or, if you would like, a dark red. If you do not want to add any color, your white makeup should cover your lips. (Only the parts where you would apply lip balm or lipstick.)

steps.title: Use black or red paint to create a mask over your eyes.
steps.content: Use black or red paint to create a mask over your eyes. Put tape (masking tape) on your face, so that you can see. Add a strip of tape to your forehead (put on as straight as possible ) and then one on your nose. This part takes 3 pieces of tape: apply 1 piece to the bridge of the nose, 1 on the left, and 1 on the right. Try to make them as straight as possible. These pieces will end up making a bar in the middle (where your eyes are). Then, apply red or black face paint in the middle. Once done, remove the tape, there should now be a bar of red or black over your eyes.(See video, a lesson by Gerard Way himself!)

steps.title: Style your hair using one of Gerard's popular hairstyles.
steps.content: Style your hair using one of Gerard's popular hairstyles. Heâ€™s rocked short white hair, short blond hair, short black hair, long black hair, long red hair. Keep in mind that Gerard also likes to add bits of color in his hair. He adds in stripes of red, lavender, and even green.

steps.title: Optional) Apply black, dark red, or purple nail polish.
steps.content: Optional) Apply black, dark red, or purple nail polish. Just make sure you do your makeup first!
